column3: na ɔsɛ dɛ woyi no ayɛw dɛ
column4: Wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn kurow no mu
Mbrɛ odua krɔn na ɔyɛ fɛw a
column5: Ɔhen kɛse no kurow no dze enyigye brɛ asaase nyina."

column2: "Nyankopɔn ama woehu no wɔ n'aban no mu dɛ abantsentsen."

column3: nna hɔn ho boow hɔn; Hɔn bo tui

column2: "Ahopopo kitsaa hɔn hɔ; Yaw a ɔtse dɛ ɔbaa a ɔroko awoo."
"Tse dɛ mbrɛ boka mframa si Bobɔ Tarsis ahɛn no."
"Mbrɛ yɛatse no dɛmara so na yeehu no Wɔ dɔm EWURADZE kurow mu

column4: Dɛmara so na w'ayɛyi tse kodu asaase ano: Tsenenee ahyɛ wo nsa enyimfa ma."

column3: na wɔnkɔbɔ ho aprɔw: Hom nkan n'abantsentsen."
Hom nkyin nhwɛ n'aban no mu
column4: Ama hom aaka akyerɛ mbasantsen a wodzi ekyir no."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn yi yɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn daa daa: Ɔbɛyɛ hɛn kwankyerɛfo ara ekodu owu mu."
